LanguageData.Thrimbo_TBI.label: Thrimbo
LanguageData.Thrimbo_TBI.description: A gigantic creature of unknown origin. The Thrumbo, but this one seems to have an Tiberium infection. Be careful, it might be easily enraged.
LanguageData.Thrimbo_TBI_Leather.label: Thrimbo Tiberium Fur
LanguageData.Thrimbo_TBI_Meat.label: Thrimbo meat
LanguageData.Thrimbo_TBI_Corpse.label: Thrimbo corpse
LanguageData.TiberiumTerror_TBI.label: Tiberium terror
LanguageData.TiberiumTerror_TBI.description: A gigantic creature of unknown origin. It's black and blue appearance shows great danger in this creature.
LanguageData.TiberiumTerror_TBI_Leather.label: Tiberium Terror Fur
LanguageData.TiberiumTerror_TBI_Meat.label: Tiberium terror meat
LanguageData.TiberiumTerror_TBI_Corpse.label: Tiberium terror corpse
LanguageData.BigTiberiumFiend_TBI.label: big Tiberium fiend
LanguageData.BigTiberiumFiend_TBI.description: Huge omnivorous mammals adapted for Tiberium. Their skin and fur has been crystalized.\n\nWhile their usual diet consists of fish, berries, honey, and scavenged meat, this Fiend is capable of using its massive strength and deadly claws to kill live prey. They are startlingly quick for such lumbering creatures.
LanguageData.BigTiberiumFiend_TBI_Leather.label: Tiberium bearskin
LanguageData.BigTiberiumFiend_TBI_Meat.label: Tiberium bear meat
LanguageData.BigTiberiumFiend_TBI_Corpse.label: big Tiberium fiend corpse
LanguageData.Tibscarab_TBI.label: Tibscarab
LanguageData.Tibscarab_TBI.description: A large, genetically-engineered beetle that has come in contact with Tiberium.
LanguageData.Tibscarab_TBI_Corpse.label: Tibscarab corpse
LanguageData.TiberiumFiend_TBI.label: tiberium fiend
LanguageData.TiberiumFiend_TBI.description: A classic Tiberium predator. The Tiberium Fiend is the most common and rather dangerous Tiberium creature. They are tameable, but only accept those worthy of their trust.
LanguageData.TiberiumFiend_TBI_Leather.label: Tiberium fiend skin
LanguageData.TiberiumFiend_TBI_Meat.label: Tiberium fiend meat
LanguageData.TiberiumFiend_TBI_Corpse.label: tiberium fiend corpse
LanguageData.SmallTiberiumFiend_TBI.label: small tiberium fiend
LanguageData.SmallTiberiumFiend_TBI.description: A small solitary canine infected with Tiberium.
LanguageData.SmallTiberiumFiend_TBI_Leather.label: Small Tiberium fiend skin
LanguageData.SmallTiberiumFiend_TBI_Corpse.label: small tiberium fiend corpse
LanguageData.Crawler_TBI.label: crawler
LanguageData.Crawler_TBI.description: A large snake. This one seems to be infected with Tiberium.
LanguageData.Crawler_TBI_Leather.label: Crawler Tiberium skin
LanguageData.Crawler_TBI_Meat.label: crawler flesh
LanguageData.Crawler_TBI_Corpse.label: crawler corpse
LanguageData.Boomfiend_TBI.label: boomfiend
LanguageData.Boomfiend_TBI.description: When boomrats come into contact with Tiberium, beware of these creatures.
LanguageData.Boomfiend_TBI_Leather.label: boomfiend leather
LanguageData.Boomfiend_TBI_Meat.label: boomfiend meat
LanguageData.Boomfiend_TBI_Corpse.label: boomfiend corpse
LanguageData.Spiner_TBI.label: spiner
LanguageData.Spiner_TBI.description: Heavily-muscled wolf-like creatures, iinfused with Tiberium. These "Spiners" are very dangerous and should be avoided.
LanguageData.Spiner_TBI_Leather.label: Spiner Tiberium fur
LanguageData.Spiner_TBI_Meat.label: spiner meat
LanguageData.Spiner_TBI_Corpse.label: spiner corpse
LanguageData.Tiffalo_TBI.label: tiffalo
LanguageData.Tiffalo_TBI.description: These creatures have lost all their fluffiness to a crystaline structure, they also seem less friendly.
LanguageData.Tiffalo_TBI_Leather.label: tiffalo leather
LanguageData.Tiffalo_TBI_Meat.label: tiffalo meat
LanguageData.Tiffalo_TBI_Corpse.label: tiffalo corpse
